name: Sara Woodcock
coverLetter: Hi, I've been working at a grow site for about a year, where I've helped trim for about 5 harvests, both wet and dry trimming. I am looking for a year-round job working at a garden, or trimming, or both. For availability, you'd have to contact me so we can figure that out. I mostly just hope to replace my current job as soon as I can. Thanks!
contact: Please contact me via call or text (503)-851-2965 or email sara.jwoodcock@gmail.com
